news_header: The cloud and AI markets have seen significant growth, with companies like Microsoft, Datadog, and Oracle positioned to benefit from this trend.
news_original_title: 3 Cloud and AI Stocks to Buy Hand Over Fist in February
news_text: The cloud and artificial intelligence (AI) markets have flourished over the past decade, with more companies moving to public cloud platforms for better security and scalability. Analysts predict continued growth in these markets, with Microsoft, Datadog, and Oracle being well-positioned to profit. Microsoft has transformed its cloud services and AI offerings, Datadog has become profitable and is growing rapidly, and Oracle has shifted to cloud-based services with significant growth in revenue. Each company shows strong potential for future growth in the cloud and AI sectors.
